title: 9-1-1 Episode 4 Review
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I don’t know if you’ve noticed but some of the incidents in the show are very reminiscent of real life events. Example: Athena on the plane with the duct taped passenger mimics that whole passenger being forcibly removed from flight video. I kinda like how they bring real life situations to light
0:53 Ironically, Angela Basset plays as Black Panthers Mother in the Black Panther Movie.
description:
9-1-1 is a new show created and written by Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, and Tim Minear. The show premieres on the FOX network, Wednesday nights @ 8pm.
